mission-liq-td181.instruction:
Enforce 100% DTO flow from Household to DecisionUnit. Refactor DecisionUnit to be stateless as per spec_td181_abstraction_leak.md.

mission-liq-td181.title: [LIQUIDATION] TD-181/182 Abstraction Leak Resolution

fix-td191-handlers.instruction:
Fix AttributeError in GoodsTransactionHandler and LaborTransactionHandler. They are trying to set read-only properties (current_consumption, labor_income_this_tick) on Household.
Direct them to use Household methods:
- Use 'buyer.record_consumption(qty)' instead of setting current_consumption.
- Use 'seller.add_labor_income(val)' instead of setting labor_income_this_tick.
- Ensure all handlers respect encapsulation.
